amendment.description: To require campaign finance disclosures for certain persons benefitting from tar sands development.

vote.text: Amendment SA 148, under the order of 1/27/15, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 44 - 52. Record Vote Number: 36.

action.text: Amendment SA 148 proposed by Senator Whitehouse to Amendment SA 2. (consideration: CR S524-525; text: CR S524-525) To require campaign finance disclosures for certain persons benefitting from tar sands development.

Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 148, under the order of 1/27/15, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 44 - 52. Record Vote Number: 36.

Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 148, under the order of 1/27/15, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 44 - 52. Record Vote Number: 36.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 148 proposed by Senator Whitehouse to Amendment SA 2.
